meanings.definition: A person who writes with a pen.
meanings.sent1: The pensters in the classroom wrote neatly on their papers.
meanings.sent2: I admire the skill of pensters who can create beautiful calligraphy.
meanings.sent3: The pensters at the signing event were in high demand.
meanings.sent4: Her hand moved like a penster's, flowing effortlessly across the page.
meanings.sent5: The pensters' words danced on the paper, bringing stories to life.

meanings.definition: The act of writing with a pen.
meanings.sent1: Pensters require good hand coordination to write effectively.
meanings.sent2: The art of pensters is evident in the elegant strokes of their writing.
meanings.sent3: The pensters at the competition showcased their writing speed.
meanings.sent4: His pen danced across the paper like a skilled penster.
meanings.sent5: The pensters' ink flowed smoothly, creating a masterpiece on the page.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of pensters.
meanings.sent1: Her pensters style of writing stood out among the others.
meanings.sent2: The pensters notebook had colorful pens and markers inside.
meanings.sent3: The pensters party was filled with writing enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: His pensters approach to storytelling captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The pensters flair in her writing added a unique charm to the text.
